body.content:
Good Day.
I am lawyer Mark Hilson, I am contacting you again to confirm if you have
received my previous email regarding your family member's estimated
inheritance of ($8.580.000.00 Million USD). I am writing to you because you
have the same surname with my late client and I need your help in getting
this money into your account for our mutual benefits.
Respond for further information
Sincerely,
Mr Mark Hilson (lawyer)
